Verses: 1 isravel Palanatra Dhraatchachchedi, Adhu Thanakkuththaane Kanikodukkiradhu; Avan Than Kaniyin Thiralukku Sariyaaip Palipeedangalaith Thiralaakkugiraan; Thangal Dhesaththin Sezhippukku Sariyaai Sirappaana Silaigalai Seygiraargal.
2 avargal Irudhayam Pirikkappattirukkiradhu; Ippodhum Kutranchumaththappaduvaargal; Avargal Palipeedangalai Idiththu, Avargal Silaigalai Naasamaakkuvaar.
3 naam Karththarukku Bayappadaamarponapadiyinaal Namakku Raajaa Illai; Raajaa Irundhaalum Namakkaaga Enna Seyvaan Endru Ini Solluvaargal.
4 poiyaanaiyidugira Vaarththaigalai Solli, Udanpadikkai Pannikkondaargal; Aagaiyaal Vayalveliyin Padaichchaalgalil Vishappoondugalaippola Nyaayaththeerppu Mulaikkum.

5 samaariyaavin Kudigal Peththaavenilulla Kandrukkuttiyinimiththam Bayam Adaivaargal; Adharkaagak Kalikoorndha Adhin Janamum, Adhin Poosaasaarigalum Adhin Magimai Adhaivittu Neengippoyitrendru Adharkaaga Dhukkankondaaduvaargal.
6 adhuvum Aseeriyaavile Yaarep Raajaavukkuk Kaanikkaiyaagak Kondupogappadum; Eppiraayeem Lachchaiyadaivaan; Isravel Than Aalosanaiyinaale Vetkappaduvaan.

8 israveludaiya Paavamaagiya Aabenin Medaigal Azhikkappadum; Mutchedigalum Mutpoondugalum Avargal Palipeedangalinmel Mulaikkum; Parvadhangalaippaarththu Engalai Moodungal Endrum, Kundrugalaippaarththu Engalmel Vizhungal Endrum Solluvaargal.
9 isravele, Nee Kibiyaavin Naatkalmudhal Paavancheydhuvandhaai; Kibiyaavile Akkiramakkaararmel Vandha Yuththam Thangalaik Kittuvadhillaiyendru Andha Nilaiyile Nirkiraargal.
10 naan Avargalai Dhandikka Virumbugiren. Avargal Seydha Iranduvidha Paavangalinimiththam Kattappadumpodhu, Janangal Avargalukku Virodhamaaik Kooduvaargal.

11 eppiraayeem Nandraaip Pazhakkappattup Poradikka Virumbugira Kadaariyaayirukkiraan; Aanaalum Naan Avan Azhagaana Kazhuththinmel Nugaththadiyai Vaippen, Eppiraayeemai Erpootti Ottuven; Yoodhaa Uzhuvaan, Yaakkobu Avanukkup Parambadippaan.

12 neengal Needhikkendru Vidhaividhaiyungal; Dhayavukkoththadhaai Aruppu Arungal; Ungal Tharisu Nilaththaip Panpaduththungal; Karththar Vandhu Ungalmel Needhiyai Varushikkappannumattum, Avaraith Thedak Kaalamaayirukkiradhu.
13 aniyaayaththai Uzhudheergal, Theevinaiyai Aruththeergal; Poiyin Kanigalaip Pusiththeergal; Ungal Vazhiyaiyum Ungal Paraakkiramasaaligalin Thiralaiyum Nambineergal.
14 aagaiyaal Ungal Janangalukkul Amali Ezhumbum; Pillaigalinmel Thaai Modhiyadikkappatta Yuththanaalile Peththaarpelai Salmaan Azhiththadhupola, Ungal Ellaa Arangalum Azhikkappadum.
15 ungal Kodiya Pollaappinaal Beththel Ippadippattadhai Ungalukku Seyyum; Adhikaalame Isravelin Raajaa Mutrilum Sangarikkappaduvaan.
